description:
Tree works subject to a Tree Preservation Order (LBI TPO (No. 367) 2007 T39, T34, T37, T36, T35, T32, T31, T33, T29, T28, T27, T30

Works:
T39 - 4 - London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T34 - 5 - Oriental Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T37 - 7 - London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T36 - 8 - London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T35 - 9 - London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.

T31 - 11 -  London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T33 - 10 -  London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T29 - 14 -  London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
T28 - 15 -  London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.

T30 - 24 -  London Plane - Lift crowns of all Plane trees to 9 to 10m above ground level by removing descending branchlets only.
